articles.title: Jim Cramer Shares Bearish Sentiment Toward Lucid Group
articles.mainIdea: Jim Cramer Shares Bearish Sentiment Toward Lucid Group
articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Jim Cramer Shares Bearish Sentiment Toward Lucid Group. Lucid Group, Inc. (NASDAQ:LCID) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer answered questions about. When a caller asked about the stock, Cramer was quick to comment, “I’ll give you my answer: [sell, sell, sell].” Lucid Group, Inc. (NASDAQ:LCID) develops and produces electric vehicles, powertrains, battery systems, and proprietary in-house software. When a caller asked whether […] Related tickers mentioned: LCID.

articles.title: Nat-Gas Prices Fall on Warmer US Weather
articles.mainIdea: Nat-Gas Prices Fall on Warmer US Weather
articles.summary: Barchart: Nat-Gas Prices Fall on Warmer US Weather. January Nymex natural gas (NGF26 ) on Monday closed down -0.019 (-0.48%). Jan nat-gas prices fell on Monday amid warmer US weather, which will dampen heating demand for nat gas. Commodity Weather is forecasting above-normal temperatures for much of the US, with a possibility of colder weather in the Midwest,... Related tickers mentioned: NG=F.

articles.title: Crude Oil Prices Higher on Oil Tanker Disruptions
articles.mainIdea: Crude Oil Prices Higher on Oil Tanker Disruptions
articles.summary: Barchart: Crude Oil Prices Higher on Oil Tanker Disruptions. January WTI crude oil (CLF26) on Monday closed up +0.51 (+0.91%), and January RBOB gasoline (RBF26) closed up +0.0340 (+1.99%). Crude oil on Monday rallied on geopolitical risks in Venezuela and Ukraine-Russia. Other bullish factors included the weaker dollar and the stronger stock market. Crude prices had carry-over support from... Related tickers mentioned: BKR, CL=F, RB=F.
